thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Ethan Norvell

author: Ethan Norvell
title: Ethan Norvell
text: I was looking for the cheapest battery operated irrigation timer and 1000bulb's site was the first one I saw on the Google search for the lowest price. There were no reviews for the product, so I'm taking a leap of faith that it's not crap. Their price was two dollars cheaper than the price of the same product on the product maker's site. I wasn't expecting a 10 dollar shipping fee for thus item; I feel it's too much. It was a simple checkout.
